Running Celeste¶

Celeste can be used in two different ways:

  1. As a stand-alone executable code;

  2. As an imported python package.

Running as an executable¶

To run Celeste as a stand-alone executable code, type the following on the command line:

RunCeleste.py -i [input file] -o [output file]

Important

The above assumes that RunCeleste.py is in your PATH variable - you might need to change the above command to match your system!

The format of the input file is discussed in input files section.

Importing as a python package¶

To import Celeste, you can do the usual:

import celeste

The API documentation gives much more information on available modules, classes and functions.
